ThingDef.label: Simple Grill
ThingDef.Description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky or roasts.

ThingDef.label: Butcher Table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: Electric Stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Fueled Stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: Professional Cook Stove
ThingDef.Description: A professional quality stove and attached countertop for preparing meals in bulk. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Oven
ThingDef.Description: An electric oven for baking candies and tasty treats. Requires kindking, coal or charcoal.

ThingDef.label: Electric Pressure Cooker
ThingDef.Description: A stove for canning foods. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Candy Table
ThingDef.Description: The candy table is used to make chocolate, caramel and taffy. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Nutrient Paste Dispenser
ThingDef.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic ingredients. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Dispenser Hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the nutrient paste dispenser.

ThingDef.Label: Soylent Machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine to produce Soylent Green from human-like corpses. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew alocholic drinks and ethanol fuel. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Tobacco Rolling Bench
ThingDef.Description: A work bench equipped for processing tobacco and weed into usable products.

ThingDef.label: Coffee Machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine built for the preparation of coffee beans into coffee. It can also produce tea and spectago tea. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Hand Sawmill
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting wood logs into wood planks.

ThingDef.label: Electric Sawmill
ThingDef.Description: An electric saw for cutting logs into wood planks. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Hand Smelting Furnace
ThingDef.Description: A furnace used for smelting metal ores into metal alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from wood logs.

ThingDef.label: Electric Smelter
ThingDef.Description: A furnace used for smelting metal ores, slag, and sand into metal alloys and silicon-based alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from wood logs. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Electric Machining Table
ThingDef.Description: An electric table and tools that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Drill Heads can be made here. Mechanoid bodies can be disassembled here.

ThingDef.Label: Glassworks Table
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Electronics Table
ThingDef.Description: A table with tools for crafting electronic chips. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Tailor's Loom
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for tailoring basic clothing from textiles. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Electric Tailoring Bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.

ThingDef.label: Hyper Tailoring Bench
ThingDef.Description: A sophisticated workbench equipped for tailoring and smithing advanced combat clothing, power armor, enhanced gloves and battle helmets. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Tailor's Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A tailor's workbench that is used to spin raw materials into usable textiles. Requires power.

ThingDef.Label: Recycle Textile Bench
ThingDef.Description: A bench to recycle used apparel into useable textiles. Recovers 50% of the original material used for the item. Apparel made from more than one resource will return nothing. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Mending Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped with all the tools required to mend and repair damaged items. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Inorganic Matter Converter
ThingDef.Description: A converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Hand Assembling Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, advanced mechanisms, and hand tools.

ThingDef.label: Electric Assembling Bench
ThingDef.Description: An electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms and basic hand tools. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Electric smithy
ThingDef.Description: A smithing table equipped for basic weapon and protective apparel production. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: fueled smithy
ThingDef.Description: A wood-fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: Electric Arc Furnace
ThingDef.Description: A electric arc furnace for advanced metal alloy smelting. It is efficient but requires a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: Hand Machining Table
ThingDef.Description: An unpowered work table equipped to process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Reinforced concrete is prepared here as well.

ThingDef.label: Sculptor's Table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.

ThingDef.label: Hand Concrete Mixer
ThingDef.Description: A muscle-powered concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand.

ThingDef.label: Electric Concrete Mixer
ThingDef.Description: An electric concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Mine Extractor
ThingDef.description: The mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract metal ores and rocks. Must be placed on deposits of minerals. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Exhausted Mine Extractor
ThingDef.description: This mine extractor is exhausted of resources.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Mine Extractor
ThingDef.description: The advanced mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract rare metal ores. Must be placed on deposits of rare minerals. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Exhausted Advanced Mine Extractor
ThingDef.description: This advanced mine extractor is exhausted of resources.

ThingDef.label: Oil Extractor
ThingDef.description: The oil extractor digs deep into the ground and extracts crude oil. Must be placed on an oil fissure created by a drilling rig. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Oil Fissure
ThingDef.description: A fissure that cuts deep into the earth. An oil extractor can extract crude oil from this.

ThingDef.label: Drilling Rig
ThingDef.description: A powerful machine designed to create a deep fissure. Must be placed on a deposit of crude oil. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Petrochemical Plant
ThingDef.Description: The petrochemical plant uses raw products from the oil refinery to produce plastic, rubber, synthetic fiber, carbon. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Gas Centrifuge
ThingDef.description: A thermal diffusion gas centrifuge is a device that performs isotope separation of gases. A centrifuge relies on the principles of centrifugal force accelerating molecules so that particles of different masses are physically separated in a gradient along the radius of a rotating container. A prominent use of gas centrifuges is for the separation uranium-235 from natural uranium-237.

ThingDef.label: Gas Centrifuge Hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds Uranium Ore for the Gas Centrifuge.

ThingDef.label: Fueled crematorium
ThingDef.Description: Cremates corpses using fuel.

ThingDef.label: Crematorium
ThingDef.Description: Cremates corpses, apparel or various resources into ashes. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Charcoal Pit
ThingDef.Description: A pit for charring a large amount of charcoal.

ThingDef.label: Research Bench
ThingDef.description: Researchers work here to discover new technologies.

ThingDef.label: Hi-Tech Research Bench
ThingDef.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.

ThingDef.Label: Medical Table
ThingDef.Description: A table that is used to craft medicine. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Chemical Laboratory
ThingDef.Description: A chemical laboratory with all of the equipment needed to create carbon fiber alloy, artificial bones and cybernetic prosthetics. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Organ Vat
ThingDef.Description: A large vat that is used to turn human corpses into biomatter and to grow natural replacement organs. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Composter
ThingDef.Description: A composter that turns wood planks, nitre and ash into mulch. It can also pull seeds from plants. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Weapon Crafting Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench that produces ranged weapons like pistols and rifles. Can smelt weapons down into metal. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Weapon Crafting Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench that produces advanced ranged weapons like military assault rifles, missile launchers and heavy machine guns. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Weapon Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Ammo Crafting Table
ThingDef.Description: A crafting table that produces ammunition for use with turrets. Can also produce sulfur from iron ore. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Prosthetics Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of very simple prosthetics. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Surrogate Organ Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A simple workstation that is equipped to craft simple surrogate organs. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Synthetic Organ Assembler
ThingDef.Description: A workstation fully equipped with an extremely powerful nano-printer capable of producing synthetic organs an AI chips. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Bionics Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of high tech bionic prosthetics. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Bionics Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of advanced bionics. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Robotic Assembler
ThingDef.Description: A machine that applies state of the art robotics to construct machine components too intricate for simple human hands. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Quantum Fabricator
ThingDef.Description: The quantum fabricator is the forefront of quantum thermodynamics and plasma spectrometry. This machine disassembles elements into base subatomic particles and re-assembles them into powerful artificial elements. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Hadron Collider
ThingDef.Description: An apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays.

ThingDef.label: Hadron Collider Hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds inorganic matter for the hadron collider.

ThingDef.label: Hydroponic Basin
ThingDef.description: A hydroponic basin can grow several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work and the plants will die if the power is cut.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Hydroponic Basin
ThingDef.description: The advanced hydroponic basin grows several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work, provides its own light source but the plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: Hydroponic Pot
ThingDef.description: A hydroponic pot planted into the ground. Requires power.

ThingDef.Name: Agrarian
ThingDef.label: Hydroponic box
ThingDef.description: A small wood box with some earth in it to grow plants. Pipes supply the ground with the required water.
